availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leonidas M. Campbell (Nicholas County, Kentucky, hotel keeper.)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Son of John P. and Mary A. Campbell. Married to Elizabeth J. Banta in Nicholas County on October 3, 1861. Father of Lucy Campbell. Resident of Nicholas County in 1850. Hotel keeper in Carlisle, Kentucky in 1860. Owner of Nicholas House hotel in 1860. Applied to add a tavern to the hotel in 1863.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0001-004-0089.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film #000252411.

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas, District 2, p. 402B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas, Precinct 4, p. 252A.
